sub_topic: Applying the Fourier transform to finance and economics
message_1: A hedge fund manager wants to analyze the frequency of stock returns to inform trading decisions. They collect daily stock return data for the past year and want to apply the Fourier transform to this data. Using Matlab, calculate the Fourier transform of the stock return data and identify the frequency components with amplitudes greater than 0.2. How many frequency components with amplitudes greater than 0.2 are there?
